listing.title: Carulina 3 Apartments
listing.subtitle: Entire rental unit in Bruciata, Italy

highlights.title: Great check-in experience
highlights.subtitle: Recent guests loved the smooth start to this stay.

highlights.title: Unwind in the hot tub
highlights.subtitle: This is one of the few places in the area with this amenity.

highlights.title: Beautiful area
highlights.subtitle: Guests love this home’s scenic location.

listing.description:
The house was built after renovating an old cabin with an adjoining barn at an altitude of 915 meters above sea level, owned by the “di carulina” family, surrounded by greenery and offers a peaceful stay. During the winter, in case of snow, the accommodation can be reached on foot, walking about 20 minutes.

The space
It is spread over two floors: on the first floor there is a living unit consisting of a bright living room and kitchen (equipped with a dishwasher), double bedroom, bedroom with bunk bed and bathroom with shower: ideal for family holidays; on the second floor there are two independent studios consisting of a kitchen, sofa bed (double) and bathroom: ideal for couples. All units have a wood stove, independent entrances and access to the common outdoor green area. Guests have an exclusive outdoor parking lot 50 meters from the house.

Other things to note
IMPORTANT
The only phone company that receives is TIM. Wi-Fi doesn't always work.
There are no shops or bars.
The nearest town is Gordona and is a 15-minute drive away.

Registration number
IT014032B5DKWAEKSC

details.title: Bruciata, Lombardia, Italy
details.content: For those who love canyoning, the mountain guides organize outings to discover the rocky canyons of the Boggia stream. For those who love climbing, Val Bodengo has a very wide range of trails ranging from 5th to 6th grade, with very technical and refined passages, suitable for those who already have some confidence with this discipline. Then there is trekking: starting from here you can reach Alpe Cima, Alpe Piazza, Alpe Garzelli, Alpe Campo or visit Val Pilotera.  There is no shortage of mountain bike itineraries (possibility to rent e-bikes at the Bar San Martino in Gordona).

details.title: Getting around
details.content: Getting to Val Bodengo is easy: by car, take the Provincial Trivulzia road to Gordona. From here, follow the signs for the consortium road that climbs up to the Maggengo. Before heading to the Bruciata, however, it is advisable to purchase the authorization for the road, available online https://www.valbodengo.shop/  or in the bars of Gordona.

rules.title: Additional rules
rules.html: The car must be left in the parking lot. The apartments can only be reached on foot.

rules.title: Additional requests
rules.subtitle: Please empty the refrigerator and freezer and leave the dishes clean and stored in the cabinets. Thank you

reviews.comments:
My fiancée and I were looking for a stay near Switzerland 🇨🇭 for simple excursions and relaxing moments 🛀 on an autumn weekend 🍂
What we found is truly an amazing place:
Apartment: simple and well-kept interior, environment with wood stove 🪵 very practical. There's everything you need 🫶🏻
Garden: perfect grass, barbecue area, brand new hot tub, views of the mountains and surrounding woods attention to detail ✨ is the winner
Host: super hospitality, a combination of kindness and communication. Immediately confident, we breathed the essence of family 👨‍👩‍👧‍👧🐕
Well done 👏🏻🤠

Our vacation in the little house was fantastic, you had absolute peace and quiet, since no one else was there and you could jump into the hot tub at any time. The apartment was very new and had everything you needed without being too crowded. A highlight was the oven, which heats up wonderfully cozy in the fall. The surroundings themselves are beautiful, you have a great view of the mountains and can start hikes directly from the house. The place in the valley, Chiavenna, is also worth a visit, otherwise we just stayed in the small oasis of peace. Wi-Fi reception did not quite reach our apartment, but that was not necessary.
We were completely satisfied and will definitely come back!
Friendly hostess, nice apartment, glad to come back :-)

A small, comfortable and relaxing accommodation, great if you're looking for a place to disconnect from technology and modern stress.
Chiara and her husband are very nice and super helpful, there are many walks nearby (very simple but with great landscapes).
Highly recommended for those who, as mentioned above, want to enjoy a few days away from the stress of today. The house is exactly as shown in the photos, the heated pool is very pleasant especially in the evening where you can enjoy stars and boundless landscapes

A beautiful property in a quiet location in the mountains with a hot tub and a barbecue in the yard. Hosts are kind and available.
Take into account that there is no cell service and theWiFi most of the time did not work and the parking for the car is far from the apartment- there is a walk of about 200 meters on a sharp rise. The only road trip that goes to the property requires a toll which is not specified in advance. The cleanliness was good overall but the dishes in the kitchen required extra cleaning. Overall the experience was good and we enjoyed the stay.
Fantastic accommodation with hikes and natural pools nearby. Chiara was a very friendly host. Recommended! We will be back.

The accommodation is located in the middle of the mountains, right on a river (also suitable for swimming). Everything is modern and clean. The property is huge and beautiful.
Chiara is a great host and very nice. She gave us great tips and was very accommodating.
Very carrying and kind hosts. The place is managed with lots of love and great detail. Thank you!

Excellent, very friendly and likeable hosts, always available and took care of my concerns immediately.
The apartment is very well maintained and clean! I would be happy to recommend it.

Chiara was a great host. Very welcoming and warm when we arrived and always super responsive. The place is just sublime, lost in nature, it's a real haven of peace.
Thanks to Chiara for this unique experience!
Great location Great people very chilled!
The apartment is small, but nice. The hotpot under the stars was great. Chiara and Andrea are super nice and straightforward.
We had a wonderful week in the accommodation of Chiara. Chiara was a wonderful host and the house, the garden and the entire surroundings were a dream! Grazie mille Chiara :)

Big recommendation
The room was a bit poorly-sound insulated though, but not a big deal
Thanks Chiara! :)

My time in this wonderful place was outstanding!
This home is special , the flair, nature and the hostess and her family are unique.
The house and the property are very idyllic, you have peace and quiet and can relax very well. Nature and mountains all around are a feast for the eyes. It is possible to hike very well. Nearby you can even bathe in cold mountain water. It's unique.
The place was small and very very nicely equipped. Everything you need is available. The amenities are very high quality, new and very clean.
Very nice details, selected with a lot of sense for closeness to nature and with love.
You have the possibility to grill in the garden and a heated hot tub is in the middle of the property.
The host and her family were very friendly, warm, helpful and always available.
The exciting way to get to the property at 950 meters was an extra great experience for me.
Thanks to you!

We enjoyed the property as well as the apartment incredibly and would have liked to have stayed longer. Very helpful and warm family. An insane silence in the middle of beautiful nature. We will definitely be back! Desiree and Philipp p.s: you should be sure ☺️
Beautiful people, kind, helpful, very helpful, experience to redo absolutely.

if you want to know what it means to be hosted by a super host, take a few days to visit Chiara. The services offered, from the outdoor hot tub to the barbecue, are excellent; the large outdoor lawn is ideal for relaxing, reading and sunbathing; the small house is clean with love and respect.
highly recommended
We spend some amazing days at the cabin. The host was really nice and always helpful. Thank you so much!

Chiara, together with her family, has created a small paradise in the Val Bodengo, which she likes to share with their guests, such as using the hotpot, feeding chickens. We felt extremely welcome and enjoyed this wonderful place in the middle of nature. The apartment is very stylish and cozy. The only downer - if the neighboring apartment is occupied, it's a bit noisy. We will definitely be back!

Magnificent river ( known for Canioning) invites you to cool off in the fresh Pozzis. The jacuzzi is a wonderful place to stay in the middle of the mountains for a few hours and aperitivo. I was even brought a pretty little bit of flowers on my birthday. Very helpful friendly family, very relaxed stay. We will be happy to come back any time!

The property is very nice. You have your peace and can relax well. Chiara and her family are incredibly welcoming and accommodating.
We felt very comfortable and will definitely come again.
A clear recommendation!!

Very nice and quiet location.
The building was very noisy in the upper apartment.
The ascent from the parking lot to the house is very steep.
Beautifully quiet location, exactly what we wanted

It's a truly amazing paradise that Chiara and her family created in Bruciata. The apartment, the view, the picturesque surroundings and the hot tub: everything is just perfect. Here in nature you can really relax. Chiara, her husband and the two daughters are incredibly attentive and gracious hosts. We felt incredibly comfortable and will definitely be back. Highest recommendation and 10 out of 10 stars! Best regards and see you soon, Silja and Noah

A very nice place that invites you to linger, relax and enjoy.
The hosts are very friendly, courteous and always there with questions.
Chiara was a good host, of There was somerhing we knew how to contact her. The house was perfect, surrouded by nature.

New studio with attention to detail, ideal for couples and multi-day stays, to unplug and relax in the fresh air and green of the mountain! Green lawn with deckchair and dining table outside, in the shade of a birch tree. The mattress is comfortable while being a sofa bed!
Beautiful and cozy place, great hosts, super friendly and helpful. Thank you for a wonderful time!

The place is absolutely wonderful within beautiful surroundings! The apartment is stylish and very clean! Andrea and his family have been the perfect hosts. We had an amazing time. We highly recommend it!

Place is exactly as expected from the description, just set aside just to unwind from everyday life. The apartment is perfectly equipped to spend the stay in comfort, just a few kilometers from the relaxing and fulfilling walks both from a view of the beauty of the landscape and the immersion in nature.
Hospitable, helpful and very nice hosts, always ready to recommend or help me if needed.
I highly recommend this place in case you want to take a break from everyday stress and wake up with a view of the mountain, perfectly immersed in nature.

Relaxing place, surrounded by nature: green, mountains, streams and paths. Ideal for those who want to disconnect from everything and everyone.
Unique hospitality. Andrea and Chiara, along with their daughters, welcomed us warmly and made us feel like family. They've always been there for us.
5 stars for everything.

Andrea and Chiara are the perfect hosts. Always available for everything needed and respect your privacy 100%. The apartments are brand new and extremely clean. Everything is functioning and equipped with all the basics. The garden is beautiful and we enjoyed being able have breakfast outside every morning. On a clear night you can see an amazing night sky, priceless and simply amazing. The location is perfect for hikers as one of the hiking trails crosses the property and there is also the option to do canyoning tours. The river is right in front of the property and at five minutes walking distance there are areas were you can swim and dive into the river. The restaurants down in the valley offer delicious dishes made with local products.  Highly recommended if you want to get away from the stress of the city and get immerse in a pristine and peaceful environment.
